faqs.question: How do I use the Scaling Panel?
faqs.answer:
### Scaling Panel Overview
The Scaling Panel integrates the Immersive Scaler plugin, providing precise model scaling tools for VR platforms.

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wikicurrent/scaling1.png[/image]

### Key Features
**Model Scaling**
- Accurate height measurement tools
- Real-world size references
- VR-optimized scaling presets
- Platform-specific scaling guides

**Measurement Tools**
- Height markers
- Scale reference objects
- Unit conversion utilities
- Custom measurement points

**Platform Support**
- VRChat height guidelines
- ChilloutVR size standards
- Resonite scaling references
- Universal VR measurements

### Integration States
**When Immersive Scaler is not installed:**
- Shows installation instructions
- Provides direct download link
- Explains plugin benefits

**When Immersive Scaler is disabled:**
- Quick enable button
- No restart required
- Instant access after enabling

[note]For detailed information about advanced scaling features and usage, visit the [link]https://github.com/triazo/immersive_scaler|Immersive Scaler repository[/link].[/note]

[warning]The Scaling Panel requires Immersive Scaler plugin version 0.5.2 or higher (Must use Blender 4.2+ version).[/warning]
